title: Split a Work Order
description: A planner needs to split a large work order into two smaller batches to run on different machines simultaneously.

tasks.description: Locate the original work order and verify the total quantity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the work order for 1000 units.

tasks.description: Initiate the 'split' function and specify the quantities for the two new work orders.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent splits the order into two new work orders of 500 units each.

tasks.description: Assign each new work order to a different machine and release them to the floor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully assigns and releases the two new, smaller work orders.
